description: Returns a list of Timestream for InfluxDB clusters.

parameters.name: dbClusterId
parameters.description: Service-generated unique identifier of the DB cluster.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: A list of Timestream for InfluxDB instance summaries belonging to the cluster.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The service-generated unique identifier of the DB instance.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A service-generated name for the DB instance based on the customer-supplied name for the DB cluster.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DB instance.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the DB instance.

nested_items.name: endpoint
nested_items.description: The endpoint used to connect to InfluxDB. The default InfluxDB port is 8086.

nested_items.name: port
nested_items.description: The port number on which InfluxDB accepts connections.

nested_items.name: networkType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the network type of the Timestream for InfluxDB instance is IPv4, which can communicate over IPv4 protocol only, or DUAL, which can communicate over both IPv4 and IPv6 protocols.

nested_items.name: dbInstanceType
nested_items.description: The Timestream for InfluxDB instance type to run InfluxDB on.

nested_items.name: dbStorageType
nested_items.description: The storage type for your DB instance.

nested_items.name: allocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The amount of storage allocated for your DB storage type in GiB (gibibytes).

nested_items.name: deploymentType
nested_items.description: Specifies the deployment type if applicable.

nested_items.name: instanceMode
nested_items.description: Specifies the DB instance's role in the cluster.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: Token from a previous call of the operation. When this value is provided, the service returns results from where the previous response left off.
